price: 31. Longola sé lusufele (ibilisa), aboyaka kogumbama elongo na bagumbami.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
